DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial split mouth design . Patients indication low dental extraction ask join research project Department Oral Maxillofacial Surgery University Damascus Dental School . Each patient whose case require bilateral extraction , one side serve experimental side , whereas side serve control . Participants symmetric teeth need extraction low jaw .
